nodes.text: Peter MacNicol (born April 10, 1954) is an American film and television actor. He voiced Tseebo in two episodes of the first season of Star Wars Rebels.

MacNicol is known for his starring roles in television dramas, including Professor Larry Fleinhardt in CBS's Numb3rs and a recurring role as Tom Lennox on FOX's 24. He also appears in a regular role as Simon Sifter on CBS's 2015 CSI: Cyber. His other voice work includes a regular role as X the Eliminator on Harvey Birdman: Attorney at Law and three characters in The Spectacular Spider-Man.
